text: Boseongicola is a Gram-negative and aerobic genus of bacteria from the family of Rhodobacteraceae with one known species (Boseongicola aestuarii). Boseongicola aestuarii has been isolated from tidal flat sediments from Boseong in Korea. ==References== Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Boseongicola
